name: Cat Colony
description:
Cat Colony

A 7DRL 2020 GAME

HELP! (translated from calico) "Our space colony has been destroyed! Luckily our colony was modular and you received our message!" a small cat meows to you through a video screen. Move with WASD or ZQSD  SHOOT with IJKL or arrow keys Collect the cats on each module for gold pressed catnip (GPC). Use GPC to save more cats if you are destroyed. Post score and feedback in comments. Don't forget to follow me on twitter too: https://twitter.com/stalkjimmy

Tech Details:
Cat Colony was made in under a week for the 7DRL challenge.
We are a two person team, used Unity and Aseprite pretty much for everything.
My PC that I use to make music on was down this week with a bad MOBO so I had to dev most of this on my laptop and used an asset for music. All other content was created by us.
